meanings.definition: A person or thing that rolls.
meanings.sent1: The rollers at the skating rink were gliding smoothly.
meanings.sent2: She saw the rollers moving down the hill.
meanings.sent3: The rollers in the bakery were always on a roll!
meanings.sent4: The rollers of the ocean waves never cease.
meanings.sent5: The rollers in the machine made the work easier.

meanings.definition: A cylindrical body revolving on a fixed axis, especially a cylindrical body of wood or metal on which something is rolled or moved.
meanings.sent1: The rollers on the conveyor belt kept turning.
meanings.sent2: He placed the dough on the rollers to flatten it.
meanings.sent3: The rollers in the clock made time roll by quickly.
meanings.sent4: The rollers of the printing press spun rapidly.
meanings.sent5: The rollers in the factory were essential for production.

meanings.definition: A small cylinder on which hair is rolled in order to produce curls.
meanings.sent1: She used rollers to curl her hair for the party.
meanings.sent2: The salon offered different types of hair rollers.
meanings.sent3: The rollers in her hair made her look like a movie star.
meanings.sent4: Her hair looked like a cascade of curls from the rollers.
meanings.sent5: The rollers created perfect curls for her special occasion.
